about.title: Our Story
about.tagline: Where Cambridge's pub heritage meets Himalayan hospitality
description: Built in the 1930s on the site of the old Butchers Arms, The Corner House is an Art Deco landmark on Newmarket Road ‚Äî a true neighbourhood pub that's been at the heart of Abbey for nearly a century.

In 2024, we entered an exciting new chapter under Lapen Inns, introducing an authentic Nepalese kitchen while preserving everything locals love: real ales, crackling fireplaces, quiz nights, and that unmistakable pub warmth.

The result is something uniquely Cambridge ‚Äî hand-pinched momos and Himalayan curries served alongside proper pints and pub classics. Whether you're here for the match, the momos, or both, there's always a seat by the fire.
features: 1930s Art Deco heritage with original fireplaces and timber snugs
Authentic Nepalese kitchen led by Kathmandu-born chefs
Wall-to-wall HD screens plus outdoor projector for big matches
Heated private cabins bookable year-round in the beer garden
CAMRA 'Most Improved City Pub' 2020 award winner

milestones.title: The Butchers Arms reborn
milestones.copy: An Art Deco corner pub rises on Newmarket Road, featuring curved glass frontage, working fireplaces, and intimate timber snugs that still stand today.

milestones.title: CAMRA recognition
milestones.copy: Awarded 'Most Improved City Pub' by Cambridge & District CAMRA for revitalising beer quality and the community pub experience.

milestones.title: The Lapen Inns chapter
milestones.copy: A full Nepalese kitchen arrives under new management, introducing momos, Himali Lamb, and Chicken Rum Rum while keeping real ales and roasts on tap.

milestones.title: Travelers' Choice & 5‚òÖ hygiene
milestones.copy: Tripadvisor Travelers' Choice places us in the top 10% globally, while Cambridge City Council awards our kitchen a 5-star food hygiene rating.

signatureDishes.title: Signature Nepalese Dishes
signatureDishes.subtitle: Authentic Himalayan flavours crafted by our Kathmandu-born chefs

hero.title: Plates that define {{brand.shortName}}
hero.description: Every dish tells a story of Nepal's rich culinary heritage ‚Äî hand-pinched momos, aromatic slow-braised curries, and sizzling tandoori platters crafted with traditional spices.
hero.quote: We source our timmur and timilo spices directly from Nepal. Each marinade rests 24 hours for authentic depth.

items.name: Chicken Rum Rum
items.description: Our signature curry ‚Äî tender chicken simmered in a rich tomato, ginger, and timmur pepper sauce. The Nepali timmur adds a distinctive citrus-spice warmth that keeps guests coming back.

items.name: Himali Lamb
items.description: Slow-braised lamb shoulder in aromatic Himalayan spices with a velvety, cardamom-infused sauce. Fall-off-the-bone tender, served with fragrant basmati rice.

items.name: Khasi Ko Masu
items.description: Traditional Nepali goat curry ‚Äî bone-in meat slow-cooked with whole spices until meltingly tender. A heritage recipe passed down through generations of Himalayan kitchens.

items.name: House Mixed Grill
items.description: A sizzling feast of tandoori chicken, seekh kebab, lamb chops, and king prawns ‚Äî all marinated for 24 hours and grilled to smoky perfection. Perfect for sharing with friends.

items.name: Steamed Momo
items.description: Hand-pleated Nepali dumplings filled with spiced chicken or vegetables, served with our signature tomato-sesame achar. Each momo is wrapped fresh in-house daily.

items.name: Samosa Chaat
items.description: Crispy samosas crumbled over tangy chickpea curry, topped with yoghurt, tamarind chutney, fresh coriander, and crunchy sev. A beloved Nepali street food classic.

reviews.title: Loved by Locals & Visitors Alike
reviews.subtitle: From first-time visitors to devoted regulars, our guests share what makes The Corner House a Cambridge favourite.

hero.title: Rated 4.7‚òÖ by 800+ Happy Guests
hero.description: Whether it's the aromatic Himali Lamb, the buzzing matchday atmosphere, or the warm welcome from our Nepali-led team ‚Äî guests keep coming back and spreading the word.

spotlights.title: Authentic Flavours
spotlights.copy: Hand-pleated momos, 24-hour marinated grills, and curries that transport you to Kathmandu ‚Äî all in a cosy Cambridge pub.

spotlights.title: Warm Hospitality
spotlights.copy: Our Nepali-led team brings genuine warmth, guiding you through spice levels and making every visit feel like coming home.

spotlights.title: Perfect Setting
spotlights.copy: Art-deco charm meets modern comfort ‚Äî heated cabins for celebrations, HD screens for matchdays, snugs for intimate dinners.

items.quote: Superb Himali Lamb Curry and friendly staff who helped us navigate the Nepalese dishes. We'll definitely be back!
Perfect spot for a Cambridge reunion ‚Äî attentive team, great drinks, brilliant atmosphere. The heated cabins are a game-changer.
Old pub with a twist. Nepalese curry was excellent and plenty of HD screens for the match. Best of both worlds!
The momos are the best I've had outside Nepal. Authentic taste, generous portions, and the staff genuinely care about your experience.
Second time here ‚Äî same delicious curry and very reasonable prices for Cambridge. Now our go-to Friday night spot.
Family-friendly pub with incredible food. Staff handled our kids' dietary requests perfectly and the fireplace made it extra cosy.
Came for the pre-match atmosphere, stayed for the Chicken Rum Rum. This pub has soul ‚Äî proper local vibes with exceptional Nepalese food.

pressFeature.quote: Keeping the local alive with pints, momos, and matchday buzz on Newmarket Road.
